attributes.action: Conscript young offenders (YO) into the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prisons are not places where reforming behaviour happens,a large number of offenders reoffend and we are locking up more and more people, costing tax payers more and more
Lets send YO into one of the armed forces for a 3 year period, they serve their time being useful to the country and hopefully find their character reformed.  Clearly, very serious crimes should lead to prison, lets consider alternatives for all other crimes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
